name: CATextLayer
desc: A layer that provides simple text layout and rendering of plain or attributed strings.

items.name: var string: Any?
items.desc: The text to be rendered by the receiver.

items.name: var font: CFTypeRef?
items.desc: The font used to render the receiver’s text.

items.name: var fontSize: CGFloat
items.desc: The font size used to render the receiver’s text. Animatable.

items.name: var foregroundColor: CGColor?
items.desc: The color used to render the receiver’s text. Animatable.

items.name: var allowsFontSubpixelQuantization: Bool
items.desc: Determines whether to allow subpixel quantization for the graphics context used for text rendering.

items.name: var isWrapped: Bool
items.desc: Determines whether the text is wrapped to fit within the receiver’s bounds.

items.name: var alignmentMode: CATextLayerAlignmentMode
items.desc: Determines how individual lines of text are horizontally aligned within the receiver’s bounds.

items.name: var truncationMode: CATextLayerTruncationMode
items.desc: Determines how the text is truncated to fit within the receiver’s bounds.
